column7: 2015. he was the son of john and carol j. (benoit) fielding of westport. mr. fielding was born in fall river and had been a resident of westport prior to moving to hyannis. he worked as an arborist for a local area tree service. he enjoyed fishing and spending time with his family and friends. survivors along with his parents include his 2 sons: john m. fielding and ryan f. fielding
column9: ma; his daughter: kiah f. fielding of s. dennis
column10: ma; 2 sisters: melissa l. cabral of tiverton and shelly a. fielding of fall river; as well as many aunts
column11: uncles and cousins. funeral to which relatives and friends are invited will be saturday
column13: 2015 from the potter funeral home at 9:00 a. m. followed by a mass of christian burial at st. george church
column14: westport at 10:00 a. m. calling hours will be friday from 6-8 p. m. interment will be in beech grove cemetery
column16: memorial donations may be made to the boys and girls club
column19: ma 02723. potter funeral service81 reed road westport
